item.title: Deciding is Easy with Clear Upsides
item.description: It is easy to pivot into something with clear upsides. Imagine switching from an Analyst in the public sector into Tech in the private sector. The upside are obvious. Tech is booming You are going into a rapidly growing company You are going into a place where you will work with and learn from some of the best engineers You get a significant salary jump Best of all, there’s not much downsides.
